name: Intel 13th Gen Core i9-13900KF Desktop Processor 24 cores (8 P-cores + 16 E-cores) 36M Cache, up to 5.8 GHz

description.details: Buy 13900KF Intel  core i9 13th gen desktop processor at the best price in Bangladesh from Intel Titanium Partner

The Intel 13th Gen Core i9-13900KF Desktop Processor is just what you need. With 24 cores (8 P-cores + 16 E-cores) and 36M Cache, it can reach speeds of up to 5.8 GHz. Plus, it has Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0 and PCIe 5.0 & 4.0 support.

The Intel 13th Gen Core i9-13900KF Desktop Processor is a high-performance processor that is designed to handle even the most demanding tasks. The 24 cores (8 P-cores + 16 E-cores) provide exceptional performance, while the hybrid architecture optimizes performance by distributing workloads between the two core microarchitectures. The maximum clock speed of 5.8 GHz provides lightning-fast speeds, and the 36M Cache ensures quick access to data.

name: ASUS PRIME Z690-P D4 LGA1700 ATX 12th Gen Motherboard

description.details: An Intel Z690 chipset rests as the heart of this motherboard, giving you access to an LGA 1700 socket, four dual-channel DDR4 RAM slots, four SATA III ports, and three M.2 interfaces. Install a wide range of graphics and utility cards with a multitude of expansion slots including one PCIe 5.0 x16, one PCIe 4.0 x16, two PCIe 3.0 x16, and one PCIe 3.0 x1 slot. An array of USB ports and headers allow you to connect resource-demanding peripherals such as external drives and more with USB 3.2 Gen 1 and Gen 2 Type-A Ports. The USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C port provides greater power for devices like audio interfaces and mass storage devices. A Realtek 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet port delivers enhanced data signal, allowing you to easily access cloud storage or stream your favorite media. The PRIME Z690-P DA supports Windows 10 (64-Bit) as well as Windows 11 (64-Bit) right out of the box.

Designed for 12th Gen Intel Processors Designed to be used with 12th Gen Intel processors, the PRIME motherboard leverages the CPU's power to deliver power and connectivity suitable for business professionals and gamers alike. When paired with an Intel 12th Gen processor, you unlock PCIe 5.0 connectivity, enhancing speeds for your RAM, M.2 storage devices, and your x16 expansion slot. Additionally, you gain support for Intel Boost Technology 2.0 and Intel Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0, enhancing system-wide performance.

Manage your system and enable overclocking with UEFI BIOS. Advanced mode allows you to fine-tune your system with a wide range of settings and options while EZ mode simplifies the experience. EZ Flash 3 allows you to upgrade your BIOS firmware to the latest iteration by using a USB drive to save and upload the file. The CrashFree BIOS 3 rescue function resets your system in the event of an update failure or corruption.

keys.speed: 1 x PCIe 5.0 x16, 1 x PCIe 4.0 x16 Slots

description.details: G.SKILL DDR4 memory is designed for the ultimate experience on the latest DDR4 platform! Whether you are processing large amounts of data or intense gaming, experience smooth system performance with the newest next-generation PC memory technology! All G.SKILL DDR4 memory kits are tested with an extensive suite of testing software to ensure maximum performance and stability.

G.SKILL DDR4 memory kits are validated for compatibility with most DDR4 platforms under a series of rigorous tests in quad-channel memory operations. It’s guaranteed to provide the best-in-class performance, compatibility, and stability with the widest range of motherboards.

Starting from 2133MHz as the standard frequency, DDR4 memory delivers much higher bandwidth than previous DDR memory. You can enjoy a faster computing experience for gaming, video & image editing, rendering, and other professional applications.

name: Gigabyte P650B 650W 80 Plus Bronze Certified Non-Modular Power Supply

description.details: The 80 Plus Bronze certification is the highest level of efficiency that a power supply can achieve. It is based on the efficiency rating of the entire system, including the power supply, fan, and any additional components. The higher the number, the greater the efficiency.
100% Japanese capacitors are manufactured using high-quality materials and have excellent reliability. They are designed to withstand extreme temperatures and provide stable voltage output.

ERP LOT6 is an international standard for electronic equipment that meets European RoHS requirements. It ensures that products do not contain hazardous substances such as lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, polybrominated biphenyls (PBB), polychlorinated biphenyls(PCBs), and polyvinyl chloride (PVC).

keys.model: 80 PLUS bronze certified: up to 89% efficiency

name: Seagate 2TB Expansion Portable USB 3.0 External Hard Drive

description.details: Compact and easy to use, the plug-and-play compatible 2TB Expansion Portable USB 3.0 External Hard Drive from Seagate installs in seconds, simplifying the process of adding 2TB of storage for your PC. It comes preformatted for Windows systems and connects via an included USB 18″ cable. To transfer large files quickly and efficiently, it utilizes USB 3.0

Digital photos, video, and music files can tax your computer’s storage, causing performance to decline as its internal hard drive fills to capacity. Add an additional 2TB of storage to free up your computer’s hard drive and restore performance.

This Seagate Expansion drives plugs directly into the USB port on your computer without the need for an external power supply. Once plugged in the drive is automatically recognized by the Windows operating system with no software to install or configure.

name: Dell P2722H 27 Inch FHD ComfortView Plus Technology Monitor

description.details: Comfort without sacrificing color: Optimize eye comfort with Comfort View Plus, an always-on, built-in screen that reduces potentially harmful blue light emissions while delivering excellent color accuracy.

Color consistency comes standard: See consistent, vibrant colors across a wide viewing angle enabled by In-Plane Switching (IPS) technology. With 99% sRGB coverage, you get the precise color right out of the box.

Sleek, stylish, and organized: Hide cords in the monitor riser to keep things organized. This sleek monitor has a three-sided ultrathin bezel, a small base, and an improved, easy-to-use cable management system.

keys.specification: Resolution Full HD (1080p) 1920 x 1080 at 60 Hz
keys.type: Response Time 8 ms (gray-to-gray normal); 5 ms (gray-to-gray fast)

name: Nvidia Quadro T400 4GB DDR6 Turing GPU Architecture Graphics Card

description.details: Nvidia Quadro T400. This graphics card is powered by the Turing GPU architecture and has 384 NVIDIA CUDA cores. It also comes with 4GB of GDDR6 memory and up to 80GB/s of memory bandwidth. Plus, it has a max power consumption of only 30W. The Nvidia Quadro T400 is perfect for anyone who needs a reliable and powerful graphics card. It's perfect for gaming, video editing, and other resource-intensive tasks. Plus, it's easy to install and comes with all the necessary cables.

Color consistency comes standard: See consistent, vibrant colors across a wide viewing angle enabled by In-Plane Switching (IPS) technology. With 99% sRGB coverage, you get the precise color right out of the box.

The Nvidia Quadro T400 graphics card is very easy to install. Simply insert the card into your PCI Express 3.0 x16 slot and connect the power cables. Then, connect your display to the card using one of the three mDP connectors. Once everything is connected, you'll be able to start using the card right away.

name: Logitech Wired Mouse M90 Black USB

description.details: JUST THE BASICS: Setup is fast and easy. You can just plug the cable into a USB port and use it right away.
FULL-SIZE COMFORT, AMBIDEXTROUS DESIGN: Designed to keep either hand happy. So you’ll feel comfortable, even after hours of use.

In conclusion, the Logitech Wired Mouse M90 in Black USB is a reliable and affordable mouse option for your computing needs. With its simple and ergonomic design, it offers comfortable usage and precise tracking. The plug-and-play functionality makes it easy to set up, and the durable build ensures long-lasting performance. Whether you're working or gaming, the Logitech M90 provides a smooth and efficient mouse experience at a budget-friendly price.

name: Cooler Master MS112 RGB Gaming Keyboard & Mouse Combo

description.details: Outfitted with our exclusive hybrid switches and engineered in-house to boost your performance in-game, the MS112 features specially designed linear switches, similar to those found in professional-level mechanical keyboards. The result is a membrane keyboard that's fine-tuned to help you win all your battles.

No need to worry about whether your keyboard can keep up - the MS112 gives you its all. 26-key anti-ghosting, windows lock to keep you in-game, and multimedia control via function results in functionality and convenience all rolled into one.

The MS112 gaming mouse is engineered to give you maximum performance without the premium hit on your wallet. A pro-grade Pixart optical sensor is adjustable up to 3200 DPI to cater to your game and playstyle, while an ambidextrous shape optimized for right-handers ensures you'll have the stamina to last all battle. And if that weren't enough, we've reinforced this bad boy with an innovative new coating to buff its stats in durability, comfort, and overall ruggedness.

keys.speed: A rugged mouse to elevate your game
